ygData.subject: RE: Vox Dead on Tarew Marr
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m not a big loot freak.  That said, when I feel like I deserve something for my efforts, I will indeed speak up on my behalf. However, you will find that
ygData.messageBody:
> Pretty dumb is you ask me - same deal with this loot - damn good item for
> bard's and because they are weaker 'need' these items more - sheesh.

I'm not a big loot freak. That said, when I feel like I deserve
something for my efforts, I will indeed speak up on my behalf.

However, you will find that while I don't have a Shield of the
Slain Unicorn, or a Runed Mith Bracer, or a Mith BP - when it
comes to randoming said items I will gladly not roll for they
are things I have no use for.

I will never deprive another person of something they could
take more advantage of on their character, rather than letting
Harmonic take something he will maybe use or maybe put in the
bank to collect dust until a uber trade comes along.

Would I bark if I wasnt included in the roll for such a belt?
Probably. Would it ruin my day? No way. If a person wanted
it for a secondary or other toon not present in the raid, I
would chuckle at them. And I'm sure everyone else would too.
Dragon loot just doesn't work like that ;-)

Harmonic.
